name: TYRON Token
product: TYRON is a fungible token for joining the Governing & Profit-Sharing Community of the TYRON Network (the TYRON Community DApp). You can also use $TYRON to buy NFT Usernames and transmute this token into SSI Dollars ($SI), a p2p stablecoin to access DeFi applications on the Zilliqa blockchain platform. Web app: https://www.ssibrowser.com
